projects.title: GoghLand
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Hado The Hunter
projects.bodyText:
- A Cab Sharing web app made using **Django** for **VIT** Students. People can create a new cab or request to join an existing cab.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: Virtual Office App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to create and manage virtual offices.
 - Features include video conferencing, file sharing, and real-time collaboration.
 - Designed for remote teams and freelancers.

projects.title: Virtual Exhibition Game
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to create and manage virtual exhibitions.
 - Features include video conferencing, file sharing, and real-time collaboration.
 - Designed for remote teams and freelancers.
